\dAki, let's go on a date, just you and me!\d%K%P
\dA date?\d%K%P
A while after the fall festival, Shion asked me on\na date during breakfast out of the blue.%K%P
\dThat's a yes, right?\d%K%P
\dOf course not! I object!\d%K%P
\dYou can't just hog Akira for yourself! I'll make\nsure I'm there with you!\d%K%P
\dAgreed. The two of you alone on a date? I won't\nallow that either.\d%K%P
Yukari and Kaede firmly rejected Shion's bold\nannouncement.%K%P
Shion maintained her confidence despite\ntheir glares.%K%P
\dTsk, tsk, tsk. You can't stop me, Yukari, Kaede.\d%K%P
\dThis date is a reward for conquering the polls!\d%K%P
She puffed up like a peacock, flaunting her\nvictory in their faces.%K%P
Shion had won the fall festival popularity contest\nby a whisker.%K%P
The deal had been that the winner would be granted\none favor, and I guess this was what Shion wanted.%K%P
\dWe all decided the winner gets one favor\nfrom Aki as a prize, remember?\d%K%P
\dI guess I can't object to that...\d%K%P
\dIt's true... I just didn't expect you to bring\nthat up now.\d%K%P
Since they had all agreed on that condition, there\nwas no room for objection. They had to honor\nShion's request.%K%P
\dThat's why I get to have Aki all to myself!\d%K%P
\dUnless you had other plans, Aki?\d%K%P
\dOf course not. I'm all yours today.\d%K%P
I was still in shock a little. I hadn't expected\nher to ask me out so boldly.%K%P
A date with Shion, though? That sounded like fun.%K%P
\dBy the way, you two can't spy on us either.\d%K%P
\dIf I catch you spying, I get to redo my date\nanother day, got it?\d%K%P
\dNghh...\d%K%P
Obviously frustrated by Shion's demands, Yukari\nand Kaede turned away.%K%P
They'd totally been planning to spy on us.%K%P
\dI don't wanna waste any time. Let's head out as\nsoon as we finish breakfast.\d%K%P
\dRoger that. I'll come get you when I'm ready.\d%K%P
Just like that, it was time for my date with Shion.%K%P
\dWell, I gotta go... But don't worry, I'll be\nback soon.\d%K%P
Kaede and Yukari looked jealous as they watched\nShion hug my arm as the two of us set off.%K%P
Kaede strained her face and Yukari cried bitter\ntears as she gnawed on her handkerchief.%K%P
\dI trust you, Akira. I have full faith in you.\nI know you're not gonna make a move on Shion\nbefore me.\d%K%P
\dYes. I'm asking you please, just please keep\nthings moderate, okay?\d%K%P
\dWhat is all that supposed to mean? Feeling\nthreatened by my charm, are we?\d%K%P
Shion tried provoking them by pressing her chest\nharder against me, but they just smiled back at\nher.%K%P
\dEheheheh! If you do try anything, I might have to\ntie you up nice and tight, Shion.\d%K%P
\dNo doubt. I might have to throw you down and roll\nyou into submission too.\d%K%P
They joked with smiles on their faces, but their\neyes were dead serious.%K%P
\dUm... You guys are freaking me out right now.\d%K%P
\dRelax. Just don't step out of line and you'll be\nfine. I promise.\d%K%P
\dI trust you, Shion.\d%K%P
\dR-Roger...\d%K%P
I felt a little bad for Shion, but I made sure to\nkeep my mouth shut.%K%P
I'd just add fuel to fire if I said anything.%K%P
\dSh-Shall we...?\d%K%P
\dY-Yup. Let's get going!\d%K%P
\dDon't come back too late, now.\d%K%P
Yukari and Kaede saw us off until we disappeared\nfrom sight and our date finally started.%K%P
\dSo, where to first? Wanna take the bus to the\nmain shrine?\d%K%P
After walking for ten minutes, we stopped at a fork\nin the road.%K%P
We'd set off without any plans.%K%P
Maybe I should have thought of something. This was\na date, after all.%K%P
\dAs much as I wanna say, 'Escort me, Aki!'...\nI've got us covered.\d%K%P
\dI already planned it all out for us.\d%K%P
\dBoy, you're efficient.\d%K%P
I'd assumed she'd asked me out on a whim. But this\nwas Shion we were talking about, of course she'd\nmade her own plans.%K%P
Was it vain for me to feel ashamed as a guy\nfor a girl to ask me out?%K%P
\dOur first stop is the local store.\d%K%P
\dYou sure about that?\d%K%P
\dWe have all day to explore the town! I thought we\ncould start out somewhere local.\d%K%P
\dI see. Hey! Don't pull so hard.\d%K%P
Shion was so excited, she didn't realize she was\nclose to yanking off my arm.%K%P
There was no sense in trying to calm her down.\nBefore I knew it, I was smiling.%K%P
\dYou sure have lots of muscle, Aki.\d%K%P
\dReally? I'd say this is pretty normal.\d%K%P
\dWell, I'd say this is pretty impressive.\d%K%P
\dYou're slender and muscular. It's really manly.\d%K%P
\dMuscular but lean, as they say.\d%K%P
I guess Shion really had a thing for muscles.%K%P
I guess it was better than being called\n'delicate.'%K%P
\dNow this is what I call the height of physical\nform.\d%K%P
\dThe results of working at the shrine alone,\ngoing up and down all those stairs.\d%K%P
\dTrue. I'm the only guy working at the shrine, so\nI do a lot of the manual labor. And those\nstairs sure are a workout.\d%K%P
\dBut don't my arms bother you? They're hard, and\nnot that huggable...\d%K%P
\dWrong. Your strong arms make me feel safe.\d%K%P
\dYou'd knock Yukari and Kaede out in one embrace\nwith these arms of yours.\d%K%P
\dHow about you, Shion?\d%K%P
\dMe? I'm your captive 24/7!\d%K%P
Shion playfully winked.%K%P
That made me want to tease her.%K%P
\dOh yeah? Then what'll happen if I hug you now?\d%K%P
\dWhat?! N-No, Aki!\d%K%P
\dWe can't get ahead of ourselves. It'll throw\nthings off for later!\d%K%P
The moment Shion let go of me, I put my arms\naround her and hugged her tight.%K%P
When I pulled her body close to mine, a scent that\nreminded me of soft flowers ticked my nose.%K%P
\dB-Bold move. You want me that bad, huh?\d%K%P
She looked down and fidgeted, but I could tell her\nface was going red by her ears peeking through\nher hair.%K%P
She tried so hard to maintain her composure.\nIt was cute.%K%P
\dCome on, it's a date. I'll take my liberties.\nYou know, I've always wanted you.\d%K%P
\dJ-Jeez, you play dirty, Aki.\d%K%P
\dWhat are you trying to do, bringing out the girly\ngirl in me?\d%K%P
\dI'm just satisfied seeing you all cute and\nembarrassed.\d%K%P
\dNgh, you're such a player, Aki.\d%K%P
Again with the harsh remarks.%K%P
Even then, Shion wasn't resisting, so I kept my\narms around her.%K%P
\dAki, I forbid you from seducing me any further!\d%K%P
\dThis is just the beginning of our date. It can't\ngo on like this.\d%K%P
Though Shion was adorable all embarrassed, I kept\nmy mouth shut. We started walking towards the shop.%K%P
When we got to the store, Mr. Marunuma was\ndoing inventory.%K%P
\dHey Mr. Marunuma!\d%K%P
\dHello, Mr. Marunuma.\d%K%P
\dHey there, Akira and Shion!\d%K%P
When Shion greeted him with a wave, he paused\nwork and waved back.%K%P
\dA rare sight, just the two of you.\d%K%P
\dYou guys seem strangely lovey-dovey today.\d%K%P
\dThat's cuz Aki and I are on a date!\d%K%P
She must've gotten used to the hugging now, the\nway she rubbed against me in front of Mr.\nMarunuma.%K%P
She had to know she was putting me at the edge\nof my wits.%K%P
\dHahaha, a date? That's nice. Then I suggest you\ngo towards the main shrine, not here.\d%K%P
\dDon't run yourself down. This is a very special\nplace for me.\d%K%P
\dAw, yer gonna make me cry. Here, have a\ntangerine.\d%K%P
\dReally?\d%K%P
Mr. Marunuma gave us one of the fresh new\ntangerines he'd just got in.%K%P
\dJust a lil' freebie as thanks for helping me out\nall the time.\d%K%P
\dThanks mister! Mmm, it's so tart and sweet!\d%K%P
\dLet me take a bite... Yup, delicious.\d%K%P
Grateful for his generosity, we devoured the\ntangerine.%K%P
\dBy the way, how was the fall festival for you?\d%K%P
The fall festival?%K%P
While I was wondering why she'd asked,\nMr. Marunuma answered.%K%P
\dIt was a huge hit this year. My store did\nextremely well.\d%K%P
Shion started to bombard him with more questions.%K%P
What did you like about it? Not like about it?\nDid you have fun? And finally...%K%P
\dWere you happy?\d%K%P
\dHappy? Why, of course.\d%K%P
\dThanks to you Goddesses, Kamimori City\nflourished, and I even got to see the dance. How\ncould I not be happy?\d%K%P
\dI see... Thanks, Mr. Marunuma!\d%K%P
That last question especially stuck with me.%K%P
What was she expecting to hear?%K%P
\dAll right. Aki, let's get going.\d%K%P
\dYou're good?\d%K%P
\dYup. Don't wanna distract him for too long.\d%K%P
Satisfied, Shion finished the tangerine and urged\nme to head to the next spot.%K%P
\dEnjoy your date!\d%K%P
\dHave a good day!\d%K%P
We waved to him as we left the shop.%K%P
After that we went on to visit every nook and\ncranny of the town.%K%P
Shion was popular everywhere she went.\nPeople teased her for being on a date, but it only\nshowed how loved she was as a Goddess.%K%P
Even while she was doted on by the elderly\ntownsfolk, she always asked people about\nthe festival.%K%P
I didn't know why that was significant, but it\nmust've been crucial information for her.%K%P
\dPhew, what a round that was.\d%K%P
\dYeah, we don't get to go around town like that all\nthe time.\d%K%P
It was pretty late by the time we returned from\nthe main shrine.%K%P
\dHa-ha, sorry Aki. I'm sure you were expecting\nsomething more date-like.\d%K%P
\dI had plenty of fun escorting you around town.\d%K%P
\dAre you saying that you didn't have fun?\d%K%P
\dOf course I did!\d%K%P
\dI loved being with you and how people treated us\nlike a couple. It made me happy!\d%K%P
\dSo we both had fun. What more could we ask for?\d%K%P
\dYou've got nothing to be sorry about.\d%K%P
Plus, I could tell today's date had meant a lot\nto Shion.%K%P
I was really happy she asked me out to join her.%K%P
\dJ-Jeez Aki, how could you say that with\na straight face?\d%K%P
\dIt's only the truth.\d%K%P
\dNot everyone can speak their minds like you.\d%K%P
\dAt least, I know it's hard for me.\d%K%P
Considering how she ended up here, I could\nunderstand that. But was it bothering her?%K%P
\dPhew... We've been walking non-stop.\nI'm getting thirsty.\d%K%P
\dI'm gonna go buy us some juice!\d%K%P
Blushing slightly, Shion dashed away to the\nnearest vending machine. But then she started\nfeeling around her pockets. Something was wrong.%K%P
\dWhat's up?\d%K%P
\dUm... I must've dropped my wallet somewhere.\d%K%P
She patted her pockets and gave an awkward smile.%K%P
\dWeird, I remember having it before we got on\nthe bus.\d%K%P
\dMaybe you left it there. Let's call them and ask.\d%K%P
We immediately called the bus company. They said\nthey'd check and call us back.%K%P
\dCool. We'll find it if it's on the bus. So, what\ndo you wanna drink, Shion?\d%K%P
\dHuh? You're gonna treat me?\d%K%P
\dYeah. We're on a date. I should've done this in\nthe first place. Pick what you want --Ah...\d%K%P
\dWhat, Aki? Did you lose your wallet too?\d%K%P
\dNo, it's not that...\d%K%P
Opening my wallet, I saw I'd used up all my\nchange for that last bus fare.%K%P
I only had large bills the vending machines\nwouldn't accept.%K%P
Could the timing be any worse?%K%P
\dAhaha. Well, I am a Goddess of Misfortune.\nI never have any luck with money.\d%K%P
\dThis sort of thing is pretty common for me.\d%K%P
Did that mean Shion lost her wallet almost\nevery day?%K%P
Since she was so knowledgeable with stocks and\nstuff, it was easy to forget she was a\nGoddess of Misfortune.%K%P
\dBut shouldn't your Jinriki powers be defused\naround me?\d%K%P
\dRemember when you helped the old lady off the\nbus? Maybe it's because we got separated then.\d%K%P
\dIn that short time?\d%K%P
\dDoesn't matter. When it happens, it happens.\d%K%P
\dLet's give up on the juice. I didn't want it\nthat bad.\d%K%P
It bothered me that she acted so nonchalant\nabout it.%K%P
\dWell, I'm not gonna give up.\d%K%P
\dWhy don't we go find a place to rest?\d%K%P
\dWhat? You mean, continue on with our date?\d%K%P
\dWhy not? We've still got time.\d%K%P
It'd be sunset by the time we got back, but\nI figured that would be okay.%K%P
\dBut of course, only if you want to.\d%K%P
\dMan, you're so good at this, Aki.\d%K%P
\dOf course I want to! Hurry, let's go!\d%K%P
\dThere's no need to rush.\d%K%P
\dYou never know. It might be your turn to lose\nyour wallet!\d%K%P
\dMost of all, I don't want to get back too late.\nYukari and Kaede would kill me!\d%K%P
I was relieved to see Shion's genuine smile.\nWe continued on with our date.%K%P
The sun was long gone by the time we returned\nhome.%K%P
As expected, Yukari and Kaede bombarded Shion\nwith questions. I was impressed how she talked her\nway out of it.%K%P
\dThat was fun.\d%K%P
Today's date had definitely been worthwhile.%K%P
In fact, I think it might've been the first time\nShion and I had hung out one-on-one.%K%P
\dAki, are you still awake?\d%K%P
\dShion?\d%K%P
I heard Shion's voice from the other side of\nthe door.%K%P
Weird. She never came to my room at night.%K%P
\dI'm awake. Don't just stand there, come in.\d%K%P
\dThanks. Here I come.\d%K%P
My heart jumped the moment Shion stepped inside.%K%P
She had just gotten out of the bath and was\nlooking sultry, her cheeks flushed, her hair wet.%K%P
While I stood mesmerized by her presence, she sat\ndown right in front of me, not by my side\nlike usual.%K%P
\dSorry, I know it's late.\d%K%P
\dDon't worry. I wasn't busy or anything.\d%K%P
\dSo, what's up?\d%K%P
\dI've been thinking hard since we got back and\nI finally made up my mind. Aki, I need you to\nlisten to me.\d%K%P
This sounded serious.%K%P
Shion's expression was earnest; I knew it wasn't\nthe time to joke around.%K%P
I sat up straight and faced her head on.%K%P
\dAbout today's date. I really did want to spend\ntime with you, but I actually had a different\nagenda as well.\d%K%P
\dAki, what did you think of the fall festival?\d%K%P
The very same question she'd asked everyone else.%K%P
\dThere were more attractions than last year.\d%K%P
\dSo it was a lot of work, but totally worth it,\nI thought.\d%K%P
\dMe too. I had so much fun during this\nyear's festival.\d%K%P
\dYou see, since I'm a Goddess of Misfortune,\nI've always tried not to linger in one place for\ntoo long.\d%K%P
\dThis festival was actually my first time\nachieving something together with others.\d%K%P
I could tell the festival had meant a lot to her,\nthe way she was talking about it.%K%P
\dThat's why I was so happy everyone had so\nmuch fun!\d%K%P
\dEven with me being what I am, I was able to bring\nhappiness to others!\d%K%P
I couldn't imagine how happy that must have made\nher.%K%P
The whole experience must have given her an\nimmense amount of hope.%K%P
\dI realized that even if my Jinriki power is for\ncausing sorrow, I can bring others good fortune\nin my own way.\d%K%P
\dA Goddess of Misfortune doesn't just bring bad\nluck. I can still make people happy, I can help\nthem have fun!\d%K%P
\dI want to make everyone even happier for\naccepting me here in this town.\d%K%P
To be frank, I was surprised.%K%P
I hadn't realized how much she cared for this town,\nor the fact she was trying to overcome her fate\nas a Goddess of Misfortune.%K%P
\dHappier, huh? By organizing more festivals?\d%K%P
\dMmm, doesn't have to be something big like that.\nI just want everyone to have a good time.\d%K%P
\dSo you don't have anything in particular in\nmind yet?\d%K%P
\dNot quite. That's why I need your help, Aki.\d%K%P
\dIt's discouraging to think I'm going at this\nalone. I'd be more confident working with you.\d%K%P
\dYou trust me that much?\d%K%P
\dDuh! You were the first one to recognize me.\nTo accept me.\d%K%P
\dYou give me courage just by being there.\d%K%P
\dSo if you could help me out-- Well, it's more\nlike, I want you to put up with getting involved\nin this no matter what.\d%K%P
She didn't have to look so insecure.%K%P
Shion was determined to make something happen.%K%P
My heart was already set.%K%P
\dOf course I'll get involved. I'll help you out\nwith everything!\d%K%P
\dAh, haha... Haha... I'm so glad.\d%K%P
She released all the tension in her body.%K%P
\dDid you think I would say no?\d%K%P
\dNot at all. But you know how it is with the\n'what if?' spiral.\d%K%P
\dYou sure you don't need a night to sleep on it?\d%K%P
Just like that, she was back to her usual self.%K%P
That was Shion for you.%K%P
\dI said I would help, and I'll do just that.\nBut you're the mastermind in this.\d%K%P
\dI know. We'll make a great team!\d%K%P
There was a huge smile on her face.%K%P
I promised myself, I'd do anything to keep that\nsmile there.%K%P
